author: dsavage
msg: improved coercion of test / directory args

author: dsavage
msg: override runTests vs run(TestResult) so test counting works as expected

author: rhuijben
msg: Simplify the logic on when to perform tree conflict checking by reversion
some of the logic to check unless a few specific conditions are true.
(add_file): Remove unused variable. Just check for addition instead of
where the node is copied/moved from as we can't rely on the path being
related anyway. Don't check for obstructing directories in single-db
mode. A file can never be a wc-root. Simplify if construct by just
avoiding the cases that we want to specialize.

author: nick
msg: Update the index page for 3.7 Beta 2
